Key Match Events: Mali took the lead in injury time of the first half via a deflected shot from striker Kamory Doumbia
Ghana got the equalizer shortly after the restart through a powerful header from Ernest Nuamah
Jordan Ayew scored the winner for Ghana in the 90th minute from a rebound
Post-Match Reflections: The Black Stars have now moved to second on the Group I table and are in a good position to qualify for the 2026 World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Stade du 26 Mars in Bamako on Thursday, June 6, 2024
Up next for the Black Stars is a home match against the Central African Republic at the Baba Yara Stadium on Monday, June 10, 2024
